about_the_game:
Someone is spreading chaos in Lunocea


The peaceful region of Solone in Lunocea is facing continous attacks from an anonymous commander. The general Azur Lionswill, in charge of Solone, will investigate assisted by his apprentice, Selen Ardent.
Dive in this thrilling story to find the suspect and unveil the mystery surrounding theses attacks.

A fun, simpler and faster turn-based strategy game


Lead an army on the battlefield to either capture enemy HQ or defeat enemy commander. Capture outposts to secure your position. Use terrain at your advantage. Ardent Azur belongs to the great family of turn-based strategy game, capturing what makes these type of game fun to play while keeping it easy to pick-up for beginners.

Planned features


Ardent Azur is currently under developpement and by a single person but is expected to have :
  • A 5+ hours campaign
  • Extra challenges
  • Online and local multiplayer
  • 12 Competitive maps
  • 7 Commanders
  • 6 types of units
